vocabinfos.mediumDef:
1) breast, bosom, (female) breast
1a) breast (of woman)
1b) breast (of animal)
1c) breast (of both human and animal)
Also means: shod (שֹׁד "breast" H7699B)
§ 1) breast, bosom, (female) breast

1b) breast (of animal)
1c) breast (of both human and animal)
vocabinfos._zh_tw_Definition:
1) (女性) 乳房
1a) 女人的
1b) 動物的
1c) 人類和動物兩者的 (創49:25)
